channel.title: Authors on Yasin ÇELİK
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Yasin ÇELİK

item.description: Yasin Çelik received Ph.D. degree from the Istanbul University Istanbul, Turkey, in 2018. Since 2012, he has been with the Aksaray University (ASU), Aksaray, Turkey, where he is currently an Assistant Professor in the Department of Electrical and Electronics Engineering. His main research interests include communication theory, especially visible light communication and positioning. He is interested in interdisciplinary studies where artificial intelligence and machine learning are combined with communication theory. He is married to Gülçilem Şahin Çelik.
